title: Ecstasy use in the past 12 months in Europe as of 2018  , by country
summary: This bar chart has 29 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Netherlands and lowest at Country Cyprus.
There is a difference of 3.2 between the maximum Country Netherlands and minimum Country Cyprus.
min_summary: This bar chart has 29 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of population in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share of population 3.3 is found at Country Netherlands and the minimum is found at Cyprus where Share of population is 0.1.

The Share of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Netherlands and lowest at Country Cyprus.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of population in the y axis.
The maximum Share of population 3.3 is found at Country Netherlands and the minimum is found at Cyprus where Share of population is 0.1.
Country  has the second highest value for Share of population.
The highest Country Netherlands has 3.2 more Share of population than the lowest Country Cyprus.
Country Netherlands is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.3, followed by , and United Kingdom. Down to Country Cyprus with the lowest value 0.1.
Country France, Slovakia, Croatia, Germany, and Spain have the same Share of population.
The average Share of population in all 29 Countrys is 0.73.
The Share of population is 21.1 if we add up values of all Countrys.
